contextmenu.description: Script to be run when a context menu is triggered.

select.description: Fires after some text has been selected in an element.

click.description: Fires on a mouse click on the element.

dblclick.description: Fires on a mouse double-click on the element.

mousedown.description: Fires when a mouse button is pressed down on an element.

mousemove.description: Fires when the mouse pointer moves over an element.

mouseout.description: Fires when the mouse pointer moves out of an element.

mouseover.description: Fires when the mouse pointer moves over an element.

mouseup.description: Fires when a mouse button is released over an element.

innerHTML.description: The display text of the link.

download.description: Specifies that the target will be downloaded when a user clicks on the hyperlink.

href.description: Specifies the location of the linked document.

hreflang.description: Specifies the language of the text in the linked document. Specifies the language of the text in the linked document

media.description: Specifies on what device the linked document will be displayed.

rel.description: Specifies the relationship between the current document and the linked document.

valueOptions.name: alternate
valueOptions.description: Links to an alternate version of the document (i.e. print page, translated or mirror). Example: <link rel="alternate" type="application/atom+xml" title="W3Schools News" href="/blog/news/atom">.

valueOptions.name: author
valueOptions.description: Links to the author of the document.

valueOptions.name: license
valueOptions.description: Links to copyright information for the document.

valueOptions.name: nofollow
valueOptions.description: Links to an unendorsed document, like a paid link. ("nofollow" is used by Google, to specify that the Google search spider should not follow that link).

valueOptions.name: noreferrer
valueOptions.description: Specifies that the browser should not send a HTTP referer header if the user follows the hyperlink.

valueOptions.name: next
valueOptions.description: Indicates that the document is a part of a series, and that the next document in the series is the referenced document.

valueOptions.name: prefetch
valueOptions.description: Specifies that the target resource should be cached.

valueOptions.name: prev
valueOptions.description: Indicates that the document is a part of a series, and that the previous document in the series is the referenced document.

valueOptions.name: search
valueOptions.description: Links to a search tool for the document.

valueOptions.name: tag
valueOptions.description: A tag (keyword) for the current document.

sizes.description: Specifies the size of the linked resource. Only for rel="icon".

type.description: Specifies the MIME type of the linked document.

target.description: Specifies where to open the linked document

valueOptions.name: _blank
valueOptions.description: Loads the response in a new window/tab.

valueOptions.name: _self
valueOptions.description: Loads the response in the same frame.

valueOptions.name: _parent
valueOptions.description: Loads the response in the parent frame.

valueOptions.name: _top
valueOptions.description: Loads the response in the full body of the window.

accesskey.description: Specifies a shortcut key to activate/focus an element

contenteditable.description: Specifies whether the content of an element is editable or not.

contextmenu.description: Specifies a context menu for an element. The context menu appears when a user right-clicks on the element.

dir.description: Specifies the text direction for the content in an element.

lang.description: Specifies the language of the element's content.

spellcheck.description: Specifies whether the element is to have its spelling and grammar checked or not.

style.description: Specifies an inline CSS style for an element.

tabindex.description: Specifies the tabbing order of an element.

title.description: Specifies extra information about an element.

translate.description: Specifies whether the content of an element should be translated or not.
